creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: lined tunic body is color print on black corduroy; applique and embroidered bands on sleeve, separated by machine tape; longer fronts with applied embroidered bands on edges; rectangular back collar with applique and cross stitch
dimension:
21 1/2 x 23 in. (54.61 x 58.42 cm)
54 in. (137.16 cm) (object part, cuff to cuff)
5 1/4 x 9 in. (13.34 x 22.86 cm) (object part, back collar)
title: Woman's tunic
